backend/main.mo: Motoko backend storing memories in a Map with submit, get by id, and list-all APIs; assigns sequential IDs and timestamps using Time.now.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature IDs to affected frontend files and components for build verification.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of various frontend components, hooks, and utilities.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind base and theme variables defining light/dark mode color tokens and shared styling.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point providing root container and loading the Vite/React main script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app flow controlling password gate, welcome page, memory features, and rendering PidduWidget after unlock/dismiss.
frontend/src/components/MemoryList.tsx: Renders memory cards with author, timestamp, text, and optional media with fallback handling and video modal support.
frontend/src/components/MemorySubmitForm: Form for creating memories with text, author, and image/video inputs including validation, previews, and submit mutation.
frontend/src/components/PasswordGate.tsx: UI component for entering and validating a 4‑digit access code with error handling.
frontend/src/components/PidduWidget.tsx: Floating chat widget providing deterministic assistant responses with message history and dialog UI.
frontend/src/components/TingiWidget.tsx: Empty placeholder component with no implementation.
frontend/src/components/VideoViewer.tsx: Modal video viewer that plays a provided video URL and shows an error alert if playback fails.
frontend/src/components/WelcomePage.tsx: Landing page displaying welcome content and actions to enter or lock the memory book.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and provider managing Internet Identity login, stored identities, and auth state.
frontend/src/hooks/useMemories.ts: Hooks for fetching sorted memories from the backend and submitting new memory entries.
frontend/src/hooks/usePasswordGate.ts: Hook managing a simple session‑stored 4‑digit password gate for unlocking and locking access.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Stub file noting removal of previous Tingi search code.
frontend/src/hooks/useTingiConfig.ts: Empty placeholder file with no implementation.
frontend/src/hooks/useWelcomeGate.ts: Hook controlling whether the welcome page is dismissed using session storage.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup with custom theme variables and base styling for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/lib/format.ts: Utility that formats bigint nanosecond timestamps into readable date strings.
frontend/src/lib/googleCustomSearch.ts: Empty placeholder file with no implementation.
frontend/src/lib/pidduDeterministic.ts: Defines deterministic keyword-based response patterns for the Piddu assistant with preset phrases and no external calls.
frontend/src/lib/tingiHumor.ts: Empty placeholder module for humor-related logic.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider and renders the main App component.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme extensions, plugins, colors, animations, and layout settings.
project_state.json: Captures the project’s current state, features, architecture notes, and description of the Rapunzel memory website and Piddu bot.
